quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因exert与express形近将overexert误解为“过度表达”，或因over-前缀联想为“过度扩展”（overextend）而非核心义“过度努力/用力”。
quiz_item.sentence: After running a marathon without training, he realized he had **overexerted** himself when his legs started cramping badly.

option.definition: 过度努力；用力过猛（to make too much effort or use too much energy）
过度表达（to express too much emotion or opinion）
过度扩展（to extend something beyond its limits）
过度兴奋（to become too excited or agitated）
